## parseRelativeDate() function

Parses the relative date string and returns a date time.

Support is currently limited, see possible RelativeDateType &amp; RelativeDateRangeType for current supported values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function parseRelativeDate(relative: RelativeDateRangeType | RelativeDateType | string, now?: Date): DateTime | DateTimeRange;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  relative | [RelativeDateRangeType](./stentor-models.relativedaterangetype.md) \| [RelativeDateType](./stentor-models.relativedatetype.md) \| string | The relative date |
|  now | Date | Optional date to use to calculate date off of |

<b>Returns:</b>

[DateTime](./stentor-models.datetime.md) \| [DateTimeRange](./stentor-models.datetimerange.md)

- Computed relative data time
